## hmrAccept() function

Enables Webpack Hot Module Replacement, call this at application entry file after module\['hot'\].accept()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hmrAccept(platformGet: () => PlatformRef, rootComponentSelector?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  platformGet | () =&gt; PlatformRef | Callback used for obtaining platform used for bootstraping main module |
|  rootComponentSelector | string | Name of root component, defaults to 'app' |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
